job_description: I optimized load balancing configurations to improve system reliability and reduce latency across healthcare data services. I developed and maintained data transformation workflows using dbt to ensure data accuracy and consistency for analytics. I implemented security best practices by analyzing application vulnerabilities and addressing OWASP Top 10 risks in web services. I collaborated with the team to deploy and test APIs, ensuring robust performance and reliability. Additionally, I configured server infrastructure to support scalable application deployment and managed traffic distribution to prevent overloads.
